summary: At the Wannsee Conference on January 20, 1942, senior Nazi officials meet to determine the manner in which the so-called "Final Solution to the Jewish Question" can be best implemented.
cast: Kenneth Branagh|Clare Bullus|Stanley Tucci|Simon Markey|David Glover|David Willoughby|Tom Hiddleston|David Spinx|Dirk Martens|Barnaby Kay|Peter Sullivan|Ben Daniels|Andreas Guenther|Ewan Stewart|Brian Pettifer|Kevin McNally|Florian Panzner|Ross O'Hennessy|Colin Firth|Nicholas Woodeson|Jonathan Coy|David Threlfall|Hinnerk Schönemann|Ian McNeice|Owen Teale|Brendan Coyle|Sebastian Christoph Jacob|Paul Bannon|Nick Brown|Rod Culbertson|Karl Moffatt|Terence Mustoo
title: La solución final
